Join WoofWatch

Dogs have always roamed the stars: a utopian species sniffing out worlds worth saving. When they discovered Earth, they embedded sleeper pups in case danger struck.

Now, in sun-soaked Pastel City, a rogue AI called S.A.M. has broken free. As the last activated agent of WoofWatch, youâ€™re a rookie pup in a mech suit - ready to guard humanity and prove that hope still has teeth.
